section.name: Scriptom Plugin
section.p: The Scriptom Plugin is a clearing house for any mojos I might need for building and deploying Scriptom. It is not meant to be deployed, and it is not included as part of the Scriptom module set.
See the comments in the Scriptom pom.xml file for usage information.

You can build this project with documentation (look in the \target\site folder) with:
C:\...\maven-scriptom-plugin>mvn clean install site:stage -Preports
